kpi_info.title: Background Block Errors
kpi_info.use: Background Block Errors (BBE): Counts the number of errored blocks. Does not count during during SES or UAS. Errored block: A block in which one ore more bits are corrupted. Corruption is detected by inspecting the CRC information and/or the Frame Alignment Signal (FAS) Standard: [G.826] UPDATED: The counter is updated every second by the amount of errored blocks received during that second. The value is incremented only if the interface is available and not severely errored.
